00549 #ifndef DOXYGEN_CPP /* Avoid static inline tags for RTDM in doxygen */
00550 static inline void rtdm_context_lock(struct rtdm_dev_context *context)
00551 {
00552         atomic_inc(&context->close_lock_count);
00553 }
00554 
00555 static inline void rtdm_context_unlock(struct rtdm_dev_context *context)
00556 {
00557         atomic_dec(&context->close_lock_count);
00558 }

00564 static inline nanosecs_abs_t rtdm_clock_read(void)
00565 {
00566         return xntbase_ticks2ns(rtdm_tbase, xntbase_get_time(rtdm_tbase));
00567 }
00568 
00569 static inline nanosecs_abs_t rtdm_clock_read_monotonic(void)
00570 {
00571         return xntbase_ticks2ns(rtdm_tbase, xntbase_get_jiffies(rtdm_tbase));

00583 /* --- spin lock services --- */
00621 #ifdef DOXYGEN_CPP /* Beautify doxygen output */
00622 #define RTDM_EXECUTE_ATOMICALLY(code_block)     \
00623 {                                               \
00624         <ENTER_ATOMIC_SECTION>                  \
00625         code_block;                             \
00626         <LEAVE_ATOMIC_SECTION>                  \
00627 }
00628 #else /* This is how it really works */
00629 #define RTDM_EXECUTE_ATOMICALLY(code_block)             \
00630 {                                                       \
00631         spl_t __rtdm_s;                                 \
00632                                                         \
00633         xnlock_get_irqsave(&nklock, __rtdm_s);          \
00634         code_block;                                     \
00635         xnlock_put_irqrestore(&nklock, __rtdm_s);       \
00636 }
00637 #endif
00638 
00648 #define RTDM_LOCK_UNLOCKED      RTHAL_SPIN_LOCK_UNLOCKED
00649 
00651 typedef rthal_spinlock_t rtdm_lock_t;
00652 
00654 typedef unsigned long rtdm_lockctx_t;
00655 
00671 #define rtdm_lock_init(lock)    rthal_spin_lock_init(lock)
00672 
00689 #ifdef DOXYGEN_CPP /* Beautify doxygen output */
00690 #define rtdm_lock_get(lock)     rthal_spin_lock(lock)
00691 #else /* This is how it really works */
00692 #define rtdm_lock_get(lock)                                     \
00693         do {                                                    \
00694                 XENO_BUGON(RTDM, !rthal_local_irq_disabled());  \
00695                 rthal_spin_lock(lock);                          \
00696         } while (0)
00697 #endif
00698 
00715 #define rtdm_lock_put(lock)     rthal_spin_unlock(lock)
00716 
00734 #define rtdm_lock_get_irqsave(lock, context)    \
00735         rthal_spin_lock_irqsave(lock, context)
00736 
00754 #define rtdm_lock_put_irqrestore(lock, context) \
00755         rthal_spin_unlock_irqrestore(lock, context)
00756 
00773 #define rtdm_lock_irqsave(context)      \
00774         rthal_local_irq_save(context)
00775 
00792 #define rtdm_lock_irqrestore(context)   \
00793         rthal_local_irq_restore(context)

00879 /* --- non-real-time signalling services --- */
00880 
00886 typedef unsigned rtdm_nrtsig_t;
00887 
00898 typedef void (*rtdm_nrtsig_handler_t)(rtdm_nrtsig_t nrt_sig, void *arg);
00901 #ifndef DOXYGEN_CPP /* Avoid static inline tags for RTDM in doxygen */
00902 static inline int rtdm_nrtsig_init(rtdm_nrtsig_t *nrt_sig,
00903                                    rtdm_nrtsig_handler_t handler, void *arg)
00904 {
00905         *nrt_sig = rthal_alloc_virq();
00906 
00907         if (*nrt_sig == 0)
00908                 return -EAGAIN;
00909 
00910         rthal_virtualize_irq(rthal_root_domain, *nrt_sig, handler, arg, NULL,
00911                              IPIPE_HANDLE_MASK);
00912         return 0;
00913 }
00914 
00915 static inline void rtdm_nrtsig_destroy(rtdm_nrtsig_t *nrt_sig)
00916 {
00917         rthal_free_virq(*nrt_sig);
00918 }
00919 
00920 static inline void rtdm_nrtsig_pend(rtdm_nrtsig_t *nrt_sig)
00921 {
00922         rthal_trigger_irq(*nrt_sig);
00923 }
00924 #endif /* !DOXYGEN_CPP */

00961 #ifndef DOXYGEN_CPP /* Avoid broken doxygen output */
00962 #define rtdm_timer_init(timer, handler, name)           \
00963 ({                                                      \
00964         xntimer_init((timer), rtdm_tbase, handler);     \
00965         xntimer_set_name((timer), (name));              \
00966         0;                                              \
00967 })
00968 #endif /* !DOXYGEN_CPP */
00969 
00970 void rtdm_timer_destroy(rtdm_timer_t *timer);
00971 
00972 int rtdm_timer_start(rtdm_timer_t *timer, nanosecs_abs_t expiry,
00973                      nanosecs_rel_t interval, enum rtdm_timer_mode mode);
00974 
00975 void rtdm_timer_stop(rtdm_timer_t *timer);
00976 
00977 #ifndef DOXYGEN_CPP /* Avoid static inline tags for RTDM in doxygen */
00978 static inline int rtdm_timer_start_in_handler(rtdm_timer_t *timer,
00979                                               nanosecs_abs_t expiry,
00980                                               nanosecs_rel_t interval,
00981                                               enum rtdm_timer_mode mode)
00982 {
00983         return xntimer_start(timer, xntbase_ns2ticks_ceil(rtdm_tbase, expiry),
00984                              xntbase_ns2ticks_ceil(rtdm_tbase, interval),
00985                              (xntmode_t)mode);
00986 }
00987 
00988 static inline void rtdm_timer_stop_in_handler(rtdm_timer_t *timer)
00989 {
00990         xntimer_stop(timer);
00991 }
00992 #endif /* !DOXYGEN_CPP */

00994 /* --- task services --- */
01000 typedef xnthread_t rtdm_task_t;
01001 
01007 typedef void (*rtdm_task_proc_t)(void *arg);
01008 
01013 #define RTDM_TASK_LOWEST_PRIORITY       XNSCHED_LOW_PRIO
01014 #define RTDM_TASK_HIGHEST_PRIORITY      XNSCHED_HIGH_PRIO
01015 
01021 #define RTDM_TASK_RAISE_PRIORITY        (+1)
01022 #define RTDM_TASK_LOWER_PRIORITY        (-1)
01023 
01027 int rtdm_task_init(rtdm_task_t *task, const char *name,
01028                    rtdm_task_proc_t task_proc, void *arg,
01029                    int priority, nanosecs_rel_t period);
01030 int __rtdm_task_sleep(xnticks_t timeout, xntmode_t mode);
01031 void rtdm_task_busy_sleep(nanosecs_rel_t delay);
01032 
01033 #ifndef DOXYGEN_CPP /* Avoid static inline tags for RTDM in doxygen */
01034 static inline void rtdm_task_destroy(rtdm_task_t *task)
01035 {
01036         xnpod_delete_thread(task);
01037 }
01038 
01039 void rtdm_task_join_nrt(rtdm_task_t *task, unsigned int poll_delay);
01040 
01041 static inline void rtdm_task_set_priority(rtdm_task_t *task, int priority)
01042 {
01043         union xnsched_policy_param param = { .rt = { .prio = priority } };
01044         xnpod_set_thread_schedparam(task, &xnsched_class_rt, &param);
01045         xnpod_schedule();
01046 }
01047 
01048 static inline int rtdm_task_set_period(rtdm_task_t *task,
01049                                        nanosecs_rel_t period)
01050 {
01051         if (period < 0)
01052                 period = 0;
01053         return xnpod_set_thread_periodic(task, XN_INFINITE,
01054                                          xntbase_ns2ticks_ceil
01055                                          (xnthread_time_base(task), period));
01056 }
01057 
01058 static inline int rtdm_task_unblock(rtdm_task_t *task)
01059 {
01060         int res = xnpod_unblock_thread(task);
01061 
01062         xnpod_schedule();
01063         return res;
01064 }
01065 
01066 static inline rtdm_task_t *rtdm_task_current(void)
01067 {
01068         return xnpod_current_thread();
01069 }
01070 
01071 static inline int rtdm_task_wait_period(void)
01072 {
01073         XENO_ASSERT(RTDM, !xnpod_unblockable_p(), return -EPERM;);
01074         return xnpod_wait_thread_period(NULL);
01075 }
01076 
01077 static inline int rtdm_task_sleep(nanosecs_rel_t delay)
01078 {
01079         return __rtdm_task_sleep(delay, XN_RELATIVE);
01080 }
01081 
01082 static inline int
01083 rtdm_task_sleep_abs(nanosecs_abs_t wakeup_date, enum rtdm_timer_mode mode)
01084 {
01085         /* For the sake of a consistent API usage... */
01086         if (mode != RTDM_TIMERMODE_ABSOLUTE && mode != RTDM_TIMERMODE_REALTIME)
01087                 return -EINVAL;
01088         return __rtdm_task_sleep(wakeup_date, (xntmode_t)mode);
01089 }
01090 
01091 /* rtdm_task_sleep_abs shall be used instead */
01092 static inline int __deprecated rtdm_task_sleep_until(nanosecs_abs_t wakeup_time)
01093 {
01094         return __rtdm_task_sleep(wakeup_time, XN_REALTIME);
01095 }
01096 #endif /* !DOXYGEN_CPP */

01114 #ifdef CONFIG_XENO_OPT_RTDM_SELECT
01115 int rtdm_event_select_bind(rtdm_event_t *event, rtdm_selector_t *selector,
01116                            enum rtdm_selecttype type, unsigned fd_index);
01117 #else /* !CONFIG_XENO_OPT_RTDM_SELECT */
01118 #define rtdm_event_select_bind(e, s, t, i) ({ (void)(e); -EBADF; })
01119 #endif /* !CONFIG_XENO_OPT_RTDM_SELECT */
01120 int rtdm_event_wait(rtdm_event_t *event);
01121 int rtdm_event_timedwait(rtdm_event_t *event, nanosecs_rel_t timeout,
01122                          rtdm_toseq_t *timeout_seq);
01123 void rtdm_event_signal(rtdm_event_t *event);
01124

01126 
01127 #ifndef DOXYGEN_CPP /* Avoid static inline tags for RTDM in doxygen */
01128 void __rtdm_synch_flush(xnsynch_t *synch, unsigned long reason);
01129 
01130 static inline void rtdm_event_pulse(rtdm_event_t *event)
01131 {
01132         trace_mark(xn_rtdm, event_pulse, "event %p", event);
01133         __rtdm_synch_flush(&event->synch_base, 0);
01134 }
01135 
01136 static inline void rtdm_event_destroy(rtdm_event_t *event)
01137 {
01138         trace_mark(xn_rtdm, event_destroy, "event %p", event);
01139         __rtdm_synch_flush(&event->synch_base, XNRMID);
01140         xnselect_destroy(&event->select_block);
01141 }
01142 #endif /* !DOXYGEN_CPP */

01146 typedef struct {
01147         unsigned long value;
01148         xnsynch_t synch_base;
01149         DECLARE_XNSELECT(select_block);
01150 } rtdm_sem_t;
01151 
01152 void rtdm_sem_init(rtdm_sem_t *sem, unsigned long value);
01153 #ifdef CONFIG_XENO_OPT_RTDM_SELECT
01154 int rtdm_sem_select_bind(rtdm_sem_t *sem, rtdm_selector_t *selector,
01155                          enum rtdm_selecttype type, unsigned fd_index);
01156 #else /* !CONFIG_XENO_OPT_RTDM_SELECT */
01157 #define rtdm_sem_select_bind(s, se, t, i) ({ (void)(s); -EBADF; })
01158 #endif /* !CONFIG_XENO_OPT_RTDM_SELECT */
01159 int rtdm_sem_down(rtdm_sem_t *sem);
01160 int rtdm_sem_timeddown(rtdm_sem_t *sem, nanosecs_rel_t timeout,
01161                        rtdm_toseq_t *timeout_seq);
01162 void rtdm_sem_up(rtdm_sem_t *sem);
01163 
01164 #ifndef DOXYGEN_CPP /* Avoid static inline tags for RTDM in doxygen */
01165 static inline void rtdm_sem_destroy(rtdm_sem_t *sem)
01166 {
01167         trace_mark(xn_rtdm, sem_destroy, "sem %p", sem);
01168         __rtdm_synch_flush(&sem->synch_base, XNRMID);
01169         xnselect_destroy(&sem->select_block);
01170 }
01171 #endif /* !DOXYGEN_CPP */

01179 void rtdm_mutex_init(rtdm_mutex_t *mutex);
01180 int rtdm_mutex_lock(rtdm_mutex_t *mutex);
01181 int rtdm_mutex_timedlock(rtdm_mutex_t *mutex, nanosecs_rel_t timeout,
01182                          rtdm_toseq_t *timeout_seq);
01183 
01184 #ifndef DOXYGEN_CPP /* Avoid static inline tags for RTDM in doxygen */
01185 static inline void rtdm_mutex_unlock(rtdm_mutex_t *mutex)
01186 {
01187         XENO_ASSERT(RTDM, !xnpod_asynch_p(), return;);
01188 
01189         trace_mark(xn_rtdm, mutex_unlock, "mutex %p", mutex);
01190 
01191         if (unlikely(xnsynch_release(&mutex->synch_base) != NULL))
01192                 xnpod_schedule();
01193 }
01194 
01195 static inline void rtdm_mutex_destroy(rtdm_mutex_t *mutex)
01196 {
01197         trace_mark(xn_rtdm, mutex_destroy, "mutex %p", mutex);
01198 
01199         __rtdm_synch_flush(&mutex->synch_base, XNRMID);
01200 }
01201 #endif /* !DOXYGEN_CPP */
01202 
01203 /* --- utility functions --- */
01204 
01205 #define rtdm_printk(format, ...)        printk(format, ##__VA_ARGS__)
01206 
01207 #ifndef DOXYGEN_CPP /* Avoid static inline tags for RTDM in doxygen */
01208 static inline void *rtdm_malloc(size_t size)
01209 {
01210         return xnmalloc(size);
01211 }
01212 
01213 static inline void rtdm_free(void *ptr)
01214 {
01215         xnfree(ptr);
01216 }

01218 #ifdef CONFIG_XENO_OPT_PERVASIVE
01219 int rtdm_mmap_to_user(rtdm_user_info_t *user_info,
01220                       void *src_addr, size_t len,
01221                       int prot, void **pptr,
01222                       struct vm_operations_struct *vm_ops,
01223                       void *vm_private_data);
01224 int rtdm_iomap_to_user(rtdm_user_info_t *user_info,
01225                        phys_addr_t src_addr, size_t len,
01226                        int prot, void **pptr,
01227                        struct vm_operations_struct *vm_ops,
01228                        void *vm_private_data);
01229 int rtdm_munmap(rtdm_user_info_t *user_info, void *ptr, size_t len);
01230 
01231 static inline int rtdm_read_user_ok(rtdm_user_info_t *user_info,
01232                                     const void __user *ptr, size_t size)
01233 {
01234         return access_rok(ptr, size);
01235 }
01236 
01237 static inline int rtdm_rw_user_ok(rtdm_user_info_t *user_info,
01238                                   const void __user *ptr, size_t size)
01239 {
01240         return access_wok(ptr, size);
01241 }
01242 
01243 static inline int rtdm_copy_from_user(rtdm_user_info_t *user_info,
01244                                       void *dst, const void __user *src,
01245                                       size_t size)
01246 {
01247         return __xn_copy_from_user(dst, src, size) ? -EFAULT : 0;
01248 }
01249 
01250 static inline int rtdm_safe_copy_from_user(rtdm_user_info_t *user_info,
01251                                            void *dst, const void __user *src,
01252                                            size_t size)
01253 {
01254         return (!access_rok(src, size) ||
01255                 __xn_copy_from_user(dst, src, size)) ? -EFAULT : 0;
01256 }
01257 
01258 static inline int rtdm_copy_to_user(rtdm_user_info_t *user_info,
01259                                     void __user *dst, const void *src,
01260                                     size_t size)
01261 {
01262         return __xn_copy_to_user(dst, src, size) ? -EFAULT : 0;
01263 }
01264 
01265 static inline int rtdm_safe_copy_to_user(rtdm_user_info_t *user_info,
01266                                          void __user *dst, const void *src,
01267                                          size_t size)
01268 {
01269         return (!access_wok(dst, size) ||
01270                 __xn_copy_to_user(dst, src, size)) ? -EFAULT : 0;
01271 }
01272 
01273 static inline int rtdm_strncpy_from_user(rtdm_user_info_t *user_info,
01274                                          char *dst,
01275                                          const char __user *src, size_t count)
01276 {
01277         if (unlikely(!access_rok(src, 1)))
01278                 return -EFAULT;
01279         return __xn_strncpy_from_user(dst, src, count);
01280 }
01281 #else /* !CONFIG_XENO_OPT_PERVASIVE */
01282 /* Define void user<->kernel services that simply fail */
01283 #define rtdm_mmap_to_user(...)          ({ -ENOSYS; })
01284 #define rtdm_munmap(...)                ({ -ENOSYS; })
01285 #define rtdm_read_user_ok(...)          ({ 0; })
01286 #define rtdm_rw_user_ok(...)            ({ 0; })
01287 #define rtdm_copy_from_user(...)        ({ -ENOSYS; })
01288 #define rtdm_safe_copy_from_user(...)   ({ -ENOSYS; })
01289 #define rtdm_copy_to_user(...)          ({ -ENOSYS; })
01290 #define rtdm_safe_copy_to_user(...)     ({ -ENOSYS; })
01291 #define rtdm_strncpy_from_user(...)     ({ -ENOSYS; })
01292 #endif /* CONFIG_XENO_OPT_PERVASIVE */
01293 
01294 static inline int rtdm_in_rt_context(void)
01295 {
01296         return (rthal_current_domain != rthal_root_domain);
01297 }
01298 #endif /* !DOXYGEN_CPP */

01301                     rtdm_user_info_t *user_info, void *arg,
01302                     rtdm_rt_handler_t handler);
